action.\",\"/app/src/main/java/lt/viko/eif/mtrimaitis/Slingo/data/dao/PlaylistDao.kt\":\"This file contains a data access object (DAO) interface for managing playlists and their associated songs in a Room database.\\n\\n`PlaylistDao`: An interface that defines the database operations for managing playlists and their associated songs.\\n\\n`getPlaylistsByUser(userId: Long)`: Retrieves a list of
